|website = [http://www.rusko.fi/ www.rusko.fi] |footnotes = }} '''Rusko''' ({{IPA-fi|ˈrusko}}) is a [[municipalities of Finland|municipality]] of [[Finland]]. It is located in [[Western Finland]] and is part of the [[Finland Proper (region)|Finland Proper]] [[regions of Finland|region]]. The municipality has a population of {{formatnum: {{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|Rusko}}}} ({{#time: j F Y|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|sourcedate}} }})<ref name="population_count" /> and covers an area of {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/total area|Rusko}}|km2}} of which {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/waters area|Rusko}}|km2|abbr=on}} is water.<ref name="total_area" /> The [[population density]] is {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population density|Rusko|round=2}}|PD/km2}}. The municipality is unilingually [[Finnish language|Finnish]]. The municipality of [[Vahto]] was consolidated with Rusko on January 1, 2009. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commonscat-inline|Rusko}} *[http://www.rusko.fi/ Municipality of Rusko] – Official website {{fi icon}} {{FinlandProper}} [[Category:Municipalities of Finland Proper Region]] {{WesternFinland-geo-stub}}
